attributes.action: Prohibit loud call for prayer (Adhan) in UK mosques.
attributes.additional_details: Despite the fact that the adhan, or Islamic call to prayer, is an integral part of the Muslim faith, Great Britain is a vastly, predominantly Christian country.
attributes.background: We do not wish to have this noise pollution 5 times a day blighting our weekends and early mornings (the 5 am prayer). If a Muslim wishes to engage in these practises, then surely they should reside in Muslim country, and not try to change our culture.

rejection.details: Petitions must be submitted using a full name, i.e. first name and surname.
